name: Shadow (itch) (Kuramura)
description:
You wake up in a strange street with no memories whatsoever. The road is blocked in front and behind you, seemingly leaving no way out. Looking around, the area seems devoid of life, except for one building where a light shines through the windows. There is someone sitting on a stool. Maybe they will have some answers?

Controls

  • W - Forwards
  • S - Backwards
  • A - Turn left
  • D - Turn Right
  • Move mouse left and right - Turn camera left and right
  • Left Shift (Hold) - Sprint
  • E - Interact
  • Escape - Pause
